alert.note: Alert for Custer; Garfield; Loup (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Loup, southwestern Garfield and northeastern Custer Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Broken Bow, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Broken Bow, Burwell, Taylor, Sargent, Berwyn, Calamus Reservoir State Recreation Area, Weissert, Lillian, Round Valley, Walworth, Virginia Smith Dam, Kent Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Homestead Knolls Campground, Almeria, Nunda Shoal Campground, Divide Hill and Gates. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 102 and 132. Highway 2 between mile markers 271 and 289. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
